titleStmt.title: Antichrists transformations within, discovered by the light within.
titleStmt.author: Bullock, Jeffery, of Sudbury.
Manning, Thomas, The Baptist.

notesStmt.note: Includes a discussion of salvation between Bullock and Thomas Manning "the Baptist."
Error in paging: numbering of p. 22 and 23 reversed.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
